function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Concentration loss and stress as part of sick building syndrome","Impact":"Reduced productivity, increased absenteeism","Mitigation":"Improve indoor air quality, ventilation, and lighting","Technologies":"Air purifiers, sensors for monitoring air quality, smart ventilation systems, circadian lighting","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building owners, facilities managers"},{"Description":"Collaboration needed between building scientists and health professionals","Impact":"Limitation of research studies on depression, mood, and anxiety","Mitigation":"Establish interdisciplinary research teams, promote collaboration between different professional disciplines","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, data sharing technologies, telehealth systems","People":"Building scientists, health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, universities"},{"Description":"Need for more research on mental well-being in built environments","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of the impact of the built environment on mental health","Mitigation":"Funding for research, support for interdisciplinary research, knowledge sharing between professionals","Technologies":"Research funding platforms, communication and collaboration tools, telemedicine technologies","People":"Researchers, building occupants","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions, universities"}]}
